name: BASIC8
description: BASIC8 is an integrated Fantasy Computer for game and other program development. You can create, share and play disks in a modern BASIC dialect, with built-in tools for editing sprite, tiles, map, quantized, etc.
minimum_requirements: Minim: SO: Windows 7/8/10 (32/64bit) Procesor: Atom 1.44GHz Memorie: 512 MB RAM Grafică: Intel HD
recommended_requirements: Recomandat: SO: CosmOS 1.0 Procesor: Quantum Memorie: 38911 GB RAM Grafică: Dark matter
